topic.title: Introduction
topic.shortdesc: A modern Gradle plugin for publishing DITA documents with DITA Open Toolkit.

body.p: The DITA-OT Gradle Plugin provides seamless integration between Gradle build automation and DITA Open Toolkit transformations. This plugin enables you to incorporate DITA documentation publishing into your standard Gradle build workflow.

section.title: What is DITA-OT?

section.title: Why Use This Plugin?
section.p: This plugin offers several advantages for documentation teams:

ul.li: Configuration Cache Support - Up to 77% faster incremental builds
Modern Architecture - Built with Provider API for Gradle 9.0 compatibility
Cross-Platform - Works on Windows, macOS, and Linux
Full DSL Support - Both Groovy and Kotlin DSL configurations
Active Maintenance - Regular updates and bug fixes
Migration from the original eerohele plugin

section.title: Credits
section.p: This plugin is a continuation of the original com.github.eerohele.dita-ot-gradle plugin, migrated to Kotlin with modern Gradle support.
